mapper.select: SELECT b.id , b.title , b.content , b.reg_date , b.mod_date , b.hit , bi.id AS bi_id , bi.name AS bi_name , bi.subject AS bi_subject , c.id AS c_id , c.name AS c_name , m.id AS m_id , m.username AS m_username , m.name AS m_name , m.role AS m_role FROM boards b, member m, category c, board_info bi WHERE b.id=#{id} and b.member_id=m.id and b.category_id=c.id AND b.board_id=bi.id AND b.del_flag=false
mapper.update: UPDATE boards SET hit=hit+1 WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
UPDATE boards SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, mod_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
mapper.delete: UPDATE boards SET del_flag=true, mod_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id} AND del_flag=false
